comment: We are helping Apple all of the time on TRADE and so many other issues , and yet they refuse to unlock phones used by killers , drug dealers and other violent criminal elements . They will have to step up to the plate and help our great Country , NOW ! MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN .
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / help-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (t / trade-01)
                        :op2 (ii / issue-02
                              :mod (o / other)

                                    :ARG3 (s / so))))
                  :ARG2 (c / company
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Apple"))
                  :duration (t2 / time
                        :mod (a3 / all)))
            :op2 (r / refuse-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (u / unlock-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (p / phone
                              :ARG1-of (u2 / use-01
                                    :ARG0 (a4 / and
                                          :op1 (p2 / person
                                                :ARG0-of (k / kill-01))
                                          :op2 (p3 / person
                                                :ARG0-of (d / deal-02
                                                      :ARG2 (d2 / drug)))
                                          :op3 (e / element
                                                :ARG2-of (c2 / criminal-03)
                                                :mod (v / violent)
                                                :mod (o2 / other))))))
                  :concession r
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 u))
      :snt2 (o3 / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (a5 / and
                  :op1 (s2 / step-01
                        :ARG1 (t3 / they)
                        :ARG4 (p4 / plate))
                  :op2 h
                  :ARG0 t3
                  :ARG1 (c3 / country
                        :poss (w2 / we)
                        :mod (g / great)))
            :time (n2 / now)
            :mod (a6 / again
                  :mode expressive)))

comment: Apple should absolutely NOT create back-doors allowing governments to access private user data . Props to Tim " Apple " for standing firm on user privacy !
amr:

                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Apple"))
                  :ARG1 (b / back-door

                                          :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
                                    :ARG1 (d / data
                                          :poss (p / person
                                                :ARG0-of (u / use-01))
                                          :ARG1-of (p2 / private-02)))))
                  :mod (a3 / absolute)))
      :snt2 (f / favor-01

                  :name (n2 / name

                        :op2 "Apple"))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01

                        :ARG1 (f2 / firm-03
                              :ARG1 (p4 / privacy
                                    :poss (p5 / person
